thread.title: QuickLogic Names Mark Sprague as New Vice President of Worldwide Sales
thread.title_full: QuickLogic Names Mark Sprague as New Vice President of Worldwide Sales

author: admin
title: QuickLogic Names Mark Sprague as New Vice President of Worldwide Sales
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/26/2015 @ 6:30 AM   QuickLogic Corporation 
SUNNYVALE, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/26/15 -- QuickLogic Corporation (NASDAQ: QUIK), the innovator of ultra-low power programmable sensor processing solutions, today announced that Mark Sprague has joined QuickLogic as Vice President of Worldwide Sales. 
"We were impressed by Mark's track record of consistently exceeding revenue targets, along with his exceptional business development, account management, and solution selling skills," said Andy Pease, QuickLogic's president and CEO. "Mark is an ideal fit for our team and we look forward to working with him as we continue to build a market for our sensor processing solutions." 
"The market for sensor processing solutions is in its infancy, and I believe that QuickLogic's unique ultra-low power solutions will enable a vast number of new applications in the smartphone, wearable and IoT markets," said Mr. Sprague. "I'm excited to leverage my past experience in these markets, and connections with various ecosystem partners, to accelerate the adoption of these sensor processing solutions." 
Mr. Sprague is an experienced sales leader, with more than 23 years of semiconductor, OEM and system level experience. Prior to joining QuickLogic, Mr. Sprague was Director of Worldwide Sales at Trimble Navigation. Previous to that, Mr. Sprague worked in sales management for RF Micro Devices where he worked with high-volume customers in the mobile sector and helped develop the company's ecosystem with leading baseband processor companies. Prior to that, Mr. Sprague held a variety of sales positions with several industry-leading companies including Integrated Device Technology (IDT), Zilog, Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), and Marvell Semiconductor. 
About QuickLogic QuickLogic Corporation is the leading provider of ultra-low power, customizable sensor processing platforms, Display, and Connectivity semiconductor solutions for smartphone, tablet, wearable, and mobile enterprise OEMs. Called Customer Specific Standard Products (CSSPs), these programmable 'silicon plus software' solutions enable our customers to bring hardware-differentiated products to market quickly and cost effectively. For more information about QuickLogic and CSSPs, visit www.quicklogic.com . 
QuickLogic is a registered trademark and the QuickLogic logo is a trademark of QuickLogic Corporation. All other brands or trademarks are the property of their respective holders and should be treated as such. 
Code: QUIK-G
